nodes.text: Nakha Urus was a male Dug who served as the Doge of Malastare during the Clone Wars. He was waiting for the arrival of his fellow council members to sign a treaty between the Republic and the Dugs when the Zillo Beast attacked. Upon realizing what this creature was, he went to gather an ancient scroll, left by his ancestors, depicting that one day the Zillo Beast would return and become the cause of their extinction.
